archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1003
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As the PO, I want to ensure rewards can only be redeemed by active customers to ensure compliance with our partnership agreements

properties.value: [CLM] CLM offers status management and segmentation and tiering so offers can be visible only for active loyalty members, this configuration is agreed during analysis phase for implementation. The assumption is that CLM will follow the agreed account structure and will get parameters and attributes for customers, accounts and identifiers from other modules, so this can be easily handled. True if rewards are claimed from SC

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
